Name: Playa del Mar
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Review: Fruity with a hint of tequila.
History: This cocktail was created in 1997 by Wayne Collins at Navajo Joe, London, England. A riff on a classic Sex on the Beach , the name translates as Beach of the Sea.
Nutrition: One serving of Playa del Mar contains 155 calories
